Literature.Title: de Novo-designed antimicrobial peptides with broad-spectrum antimicrobial potency and rapid wound disinfection
Literature.Reference: Colloid Surf A Physicochem Eng Asp. 2023;667:131355
Literature.Author: Zheng YF, Chen SX, Mao KJ, Zhu XY, Jiang MY, Wu CJ, Lu JR, Zhu H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=>250 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=96 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=>250 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=125µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 700926(MIC=125µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=31.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=31.3µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=250µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>250µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>250µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=>250µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>250µM)
